snippet.title: PINEAPPLE : A BITTERSWEET REVENGE
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2791360/PINEAPPLE_A_Bittersweet_Revenge/

PINEAPPLE unfolds the tale of a bittersweet revenge, as the classroom bully will get a taste of her own medicine. Through a series of pineapple pranks, she'll learn her lesson. Yet she won't be the only one.

An unconventional gaming adventure, PINEAPPLE combines a humorous storyline with delightful mini-games for an engaging experience. This interactive tale weaves amusement, ease, and wit, unfolding a rib-tickling story about the quirks of bullying.
